title: Suitability
fullText:
The switchboard shall be designed to be adequately protected against damage that may reasonably be expected from external influences and that the switchboard may be exposed to under normal operating conditions.
Damage from such influences may include mechanical damage, damage due to exposure to weather, water, excessive dampness, accumulation of dust, temperature, vibration or any other influence to which the switchboard may be exposed under the conditions of use.
